# Blockchain Types
```json
[
  {
    "name": "OriginFor<T>",
    "description": "",
    "examples": [
    ]
  },
  {
    "name": "CollectionId",
    "description": "Represents the collection id. This value is autogenerated by the system.",
    "type": "u32",
    "min": 0,
    "max": 4294967295
  },
  {
    "name": "NFTId",
    "description": "Represents the NFT id. This value is autogenerated by the system.",
    "type": "u32",
    "min": 0,
    "max": 4294967295
  },
  {
    "name": "BoundedVec<u8, Limit>",
    "description": "Represents and array of objects with the max length defined by the Limit value.",
    "examples": [     
      "BoundedVec<u8, OffchainDataLimit>",
      "U8BoundedVec<CollectionOffchainDataLimit>"
    ]
  },
  {
    "name": "UBoundedVec<Limit>",
    "description": "Represents and array of objects with the max length defined by the Limit value.",
    "type": "BoundedVec<u8, Limit>"
  },
  {
    "name": "Permill",
    "description": "Represents the following percentage range [0.000%, 100.000%] using integers.",
    "min": 0,
    "max": 1000000
  },
  {
    "name": "Option<_>",
    "description": "Represents an optional value/parameter.",
    "examples": [
      "Option<CollectionId>",
      "Option<u32>",
      "Option<BoundedVec<u8, OffchainDataLimit>"      
    ]
  }
]
```

### Blockchain Limits
```json
[
  {
    "name": "NFTOffchainDataLimit",
    "description": "TODO",
    "type": "u32",
    "value": 150
  },
  {
    "name": "CollectionSizeLimit",
    "description": "TODO",
    "type": "u32",
    "value": 1000000
  },
  {
    "name": "CollectionOffchainDataLimit",
    "description": "TODO",
    "type": "u32",
    "value": 150
  }
]
```
